Content.Text:
<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So glad to see you here at
<GREEN>Sandra's Stall</GREEN>!
Have a look around!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Gyaaah!
Nothing to trade?
Are you playing a prank?
<PAGE>
I'm busy here!
Get out!

<FACE_SANDRA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, it's you!
This is <GREEN>Sandra's Stall</GREEN>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ROUGH>You finally got curious enough
to come visit my little stall, eh?
I've traded many a valuable item here!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I even carry recipes and
blueprints! Yes.
Look around and you'll see!
